import axios from'axios';const CLOUDINARY_UPLOAD_TRANSFORM_PRESET='dfnrvqvx';// img transformed to 200x200
const CLOUDINARY_UPLOAD_PRESET='nlczu2np';const CLOUDINARY_UPLOAD_URL='https://api.cloudinary.com/v1_1/rengorum/upload';export const imageUploadApi=(file,transform=true)=>{const formData=new FormData();formData.append('file',file);const upload_preset=transform?CLOUDINARY_UPLOAD_TRANSFORM_PRESET:CLOUDINARY_UPLOAD_PRESET;formData.append('upload_preset',upload_preset);return axios.post(CLOUDINARY_UPLOAD_URL,formData,null);};
